resources.string: Tasks can be completed in any order, but all must be complete to complete the container
Tasks progress can only be completed in order
Container used for Quests that will complete when any of the containing tasks are completed. Any remaining tasks are disabled unless explicitly marked as Stay Active
Get the Killing Blow X times on an AI (optionally with a specific weapon)
Get the Killing Blow X times on an AI with a specific weapon class
Task that tracks the state of a faction's territory possession
Variant of TaskGoTo that completes once the player is in the location of a given duration. Requires AT LEAST one POITag or Territory ID, or both.
Succeeds if player is/achieves target level. If ItemName is provided for target Categorical Progression Id, then target level within that progression succeeds.
Mostly Deprecated, does not work with Trading Post
DO NOT USE
Triggers when the player is within a specific location
DO NOT USE
Variant of TaskGoTo that sends a player to a territory
Variant of TaskGoTo that sends a player to a poi
Variant of TaskGoTo that sends a player to a poi on a specific territory
Triggers when recipes are pinned, a specific one, or any if not specified
Recipe crafting, can be used for crafting stations
Refining Recipe (crafting, but with added check for recipe data flag \"IsRefining = true\"), can be used for crafting stations.
Craft a weapon of the specified family (bow, sword, etc)
Craft an Item of the specified family (e.g. Dye, etc.)
Refine craft an Item of the specified family (e.g. RefinedResource, etc.)
DO NOT USE
The player needs to use the specific item
Item must be equipped onto the characters paperdoll
Equip a weapon of the specified family with an optional gear score
A generic task that is triggered by a game event occurring
A task that triggers a game-event when active. Follows the same fields as TaskGameEvent
Task that progresses when an achievement is completed, starts completed if player has already unlocked the achievement

Task that unlocks an achievement when task is added, and locks it when the task is removed (progress begins completed, nothing progresses this task). If you abandon or reset the quest for this task, it will lock the achievement.

Task the unlocks an achievement when the task is added (progress begins completed, nothing progresses this task). If you abandon or reset the quest for this task after it has been activated, it will lock the achievement (set ShouldCheckPoints to true to suppress this functionality).

Task that locks an achievement when task is added, and unlocks it when the task is removed (progress begins completed, nothing progresses this task). If you abandon or reset the quest for this task, it will unlock the achievement.

Task the locks an achievement when the task is added (progress begins completed, nothing progresses this task). By default, if you abandon or reset the quest for this task after it has been activated, it will unlock the achievement (set ShouldCheckPoints to true to suppress this functionality).
DO NOT USE
Task that completes when the player has completed faction selection.
Task that completes when the player enters a particular conversation state

Task that completes when the player chooses a particular conversation topic. Will not be completed until the player has fully progressed through all dialogues in the conversation topic, and has exited the conversation.
Task that adds an additional objective to the player, and tracks it through until completion.
Occurs if the player contributes to a kill or destroy (optionally with a specific weapon class)

Looks at the owner's inventory for the given items. Using ChestDropProbability (for chest drops) and ItemDropVC / ItemDropProbability (for kills) on the same TaskHaveItem provides the objective item from both kills and chests.
Is removed upon completion
Must be collected by gathering
Must be collected by gathering and is removed upon completion
Look at the player's inventory for a weapon of the specified family and optionally a gear score
Look at the player's inventory for an item of the specified family and optionally a gear score
Gives the player an item and may remove it.
Is removed upon completion
Removes the specified item amount from the inventory and paperdoll slots (it won't check global storage yet).
Occurs when the player salvages the given item
Untested. Same properties as TaskInteract, but can grey out the interact text when this task isn't active. Tracks unique entities with a matching Interact tag the player has interacted with.
Interact with an object (succeeds upon interact completion)
Task completes if player joins a company
Task is completed if player dies
Occurs when the player opens the specific UI screen
Task is completed if specified time expires
Task is completed when the player equips a fishing pole.
Task that tracks the number of times the player has cast their fishing line
Task that tracks the number of times the player has hooked a fish
Task that tracks the number of times the player has reeled in a catch successfully (fish or non-fish)
Task that tracks the number of successful catches from any hotspot
Task that tracks the number of successful catches from a specified category of hotspot
Task that tracks the number of times the player has reeled in a fish successfully (like TaskFishingReel but wont increment on catching a boot or seaweed)
Task that tracks the number of times the player has caught a particular fish (small bass, medium bass, large salmon, etc)
Task that tracks the number of time the player has caught a fish > a specified weight
Task that tracks the number of time the player has caught a fish > a specified length
Task that tracks the number of times the player has caught a fish > a specified rarity
This task only increments progress when the player actually gathers something, not just when they already have the items in their inventory. Does not work with quest items.

This task increments progress when the player gathers the specified cyclic gatherable state. Set StayActive to true to make it so progress will regress after the task is completed if the player gathers the wrong state.
Have at least one house with the specified decoration score
Task that progresses when the player enters the target Game Mode. Each game mode has a unique ID, these can be found in JavelinData_GameModes.xml
Task that completes when it receives the OnClaimButtonPressed message and the objective IDs match.
Task that tracks the number of times daily challenges have been completed.
Task that tracks the number of times weekly challenges have been completed.
Task that tracks the number of objectives of a certain type.
Progresses when the player completes the final phase of ANY dungeon game mode
Progresses when the player completes a performance of the target song
Progresses when the player performs an emote for the emote's gatherable duration
Task for timed or untimed quests that require the player to follow a sequential list of checkpoints. E.g. mount race
Task that triggers a block of slayerscript- use caution when applying this task!
Variant of TaskGoTo that sends a player outside a POI
Variant of TaskGoTo that sends a player outside of a territory
Variant of TaskGoTo that sends a player outside of a POI and outside of a territory
Task for detecting the ending of a specific cutscene
Task for detecting the starting of a specific cinematic video
Task for detecting the ending of a specific cinematic video
NONE
DO NOT USE
DO NOT USE
QuestToolV2/BackupRecoveryData
Localization
LocalizationHistory.xml
LocalizationHelper.txt
UnrecoveredLocalization
